price: आद ने (भी) झुठलाया। तो कैसी थी मेरी यातना तथा मेरा डराना?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
